definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]

sentences.english: The accuracy and precision of measurements from electrical meter were analyzed by statistical technique.
sentences.chinese: 以统计方法分析所量得含水率数值之准确性与精密性。

sentences.english: Ttip the punctuated equilibrium of market economics in their favor.
sentences.chinese: 以自己的方式确定市场经济的准确平衡。

sentences.english: To enhance the correctness of curtain, card, material and warrant.
sentences.chinese: 提高库存料件的帐，卡，物和单证输入的准确率。

sentences.english: At present, China's commercial banks is also difficult to accurately estimate the expected loss of non-lending.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国商业银行还难以准确估算贷款非预期损失。

sentences.english: An accurate description will help the Customs Authority of the country of destination to clear the products quickly.
sentences.chinese: 准确的货物名称有助于进口国海关快速清关。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the accuracy of imaging diagnosis of intrathoracic tumor-simulating extramedullary hematopoiesis(EMH).
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对胸内瘤样髓外造血组织影像诊断的准确性。

sentences.english: The accuracy of ELISA was compared with the traditional mouse bioassay system.
sentences.chinese: 用传统的小鼠生物试验比较了方法的准确性。

sentences.english: The marketing strategy of Taobao makes it easy for customers to know the brand information.
sentences.chinese: 淘宝网的营销活动向目标受众准确传达了品牌信息。

sentences.english: We should train our students to speak English fluently and accurately.
sentences.chinese: 我们应培养学生流利而准确地讲英语。

sentences.english: Because it can precisely dose the raw materials, we can ensure the quality.
sentences.chinese: 因计量准确，能有效地保证粉煤灰或灰砂砖的质量。

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the accuracy of sample size determination involving binormal ROC parameter estimation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨ROC双正态样本量估计方法的准确性。

sentences.english: The command of the accurate pronunciation of polyphonic characters is the key to the standardization of Chinese character pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 准确掌握多音异读字是人们规范认读汉字的关键。

sentences.english: The aeration and heat calculations of machine are very complex, and the results are not very veracious.
sentences.chinese: 电机的通风发热计算较复杂，一般计算准确度较差。

sentences.english: Objective To identify Umbelliferous fructification herbs.
sentences.chinese: 目的准确地鉴别伞形科果实类药材。

sentences.english: It is impossible to pide a given common angle or arc(instead of the particular angles or arcs)into three equal parts by using a rule and compasses.
sentences.chinese: 用尺规将一个任意角或弧绝对准确三等分是不可能的。

sentences.english: Assign exact timings for when each task starts and ends.
sentences.chinese: 当每个任务形如或者结束的时间计算准确的时间。

definition: to grasp (also fig.)/to seize/to hold/assurance/certainty/sure (of the outcome)
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
